thread.section_title: Frame My TV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frame My TV | framemytv.com
thread.title: Rocky Settecasi
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by Rocky Settecasi

author: Rocky Settecasi
title: Rocky Settecasi
text: We have worked with other art screen manufacturers in the past and our experience with Frame My TV was by far the most efficient and easy to process in terms of art / frame selection and product delivery. The selection of art is great, and the design process online is much easier than any other system we have used in the past. The art, frame and mechanism all look great and work well with our automation system. The system operates quietly and the finished installation looks fantastic!
